name: Adult Green Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walking, 80 ft. flying, 40 ft. swimming
description: The Adult Green Dragon has vibrant emerald to dark, forest green scales, a long body, leaf-shaped wings, and sharp, curved horns, making it adept at blending into forest environments.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate and terrify with hallucinogenic gas and innate spells marks the Adult Green Dragon as a dangerous opponent in both tactical and psychological warfare.
goals: It seeks to corrupt its surroundings and manipulate victims, often engaging in mind games and territorial defense.
relations: Adult Green Dragons often interact with other dragon types, forest creatures, and can be masters to less intelligent beings they manipulate.
environment: Typically found deep in forests, its home is characterized by corrupted natural elements to suit its desires.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and condition, high intelligence and cunning allow for strategic combat and manipulation, along with exceptional perceptions.
weaknesses: Relatively low Dexterity decreases agility, making it vulnerable to physical attacks that bypass its defenses.
attacks: It can deliver devastating bite, claw, and tail attacks, along with powerful breath weapon and spellcasting capabilities.
most_powerful_ability: Poison Breath, a deadly cone of poisonous gas that deals significant damage and can incapacitate those who fail to resist its effects.
senses: Possesses blindsight for 60 feet and a remarkable passive Perception score of 22, allowing it to detect hidden threats effortlessly.
skills: Skilled in Deception, Insight, and Stealth, making it adept at manipulating and ambushing foes.
additional_information: Amphibious: Can breathe air and water.
Legendary Resistance allows it to ignore failed saving throws thrice a day.
Woodland Stalker grants advantage on Stealth checks in forested areas.
Hallucinogenic Gas causes fear in creatures starting their turn nearby.
Legendary actions enable it to react fearlessly during combat, maintaining offensive pressure.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting allows it to cast spells like modify memory and scrying without material components, enhancing its manipulative abilities.
